posts.post_content:
Hello everyone,
I'm a new member looking for my 16th and final card in the 1910 Obak Vancouver set.
The player is Lewis (I believe Carl was his first name).
The pose shows his gloved arm raised in the air.
I am looking for an unstamped card that presents reasonably well on the front and back.
Please PM me if you have one for sale.
Thanks!

Just checking back to see if anyone has a spare 1910 Obak Lewis (Vancouver) they are willing to part with.
Thanks!
